name: Forsaken (itch) (bpstudiosaron)
description:
"The year is 2033. You are approaching Earth's atmosphere in your space capsule. You shouldn't have come back. But your cat matters most to you...

It's been 10 years since you left Coots, returning is risky."

'Forsaken' is a 2d, top-down shooter where the objective is to retrieve your lost cat named 'Coots', fighting off hordes of enemies in a post-apocalyptic world.

Enpurr and Survive!

Made for the Ludwig Game Jam 2023!

Please don't give up after 1 try. Spent a lot of time balancing...

https://bpstudios.nl/forsaken.html
